mapper.update:
update wholesale_detail
seatid = #{seatid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
saleqty = #{saleqty,jdbcType=NUMERIC},

where wholesaleid = #{wholesaleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and proid = #{proid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update wholesale_detail set seatid = #{seatid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, saleqty = #{saleqty,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, saleprice = #{saleprice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, saletax = #{saletax,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, costprice = #{costprice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, packetqty = #{packetqty,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, boxqty = #{boxqty,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, flowid = #{flowid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, frprice = #{frprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, exrate = #{exrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where wholesaleid = #{wholesaleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and proid = #{proid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
